ModMetaData.name: Questionable Ethics Enhanced
ModMetaData.author: Mario55770
ModMetaData.description: If any of the past authors want me to take this down, I will do so. However, I made this so theres at least a 1.3 up today. Contains organ growing, organ extraction, animal/humanoid cloning, brain reprogramming... and all manner of ethically questionable stuff! Continuing KongMD's Questionable Ethics Enhanced, as it appears it was not updated to 1.3 https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1787359789 If you think that making human leather hats is too mundane, then this mod will spice things up. * Grow organs in vats! * Clone animals and humanoids! Clones have the traits and passions of their "parent". * Scan brains to preserve the skill levels of a pawn! Apply any brain template to your clones, to get them up-to-speed fast. * Recruit hostile pawns instantly with nerve stapling! * Balance the mod as you wish, with the Mod Settings menu * Enhancements to the original Questionable Ethics mod Thanks to Mehni for getting me answers to the questions I needed to get this thing done. Supports Alien Races out of the box. See the mod description page on Steam for more details!
